verses.verse: וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su did בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּתְּנֵ֧ם <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nem delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- them into the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim. years

וַתָּ֥עָז <S%H5810><s%> vat-Ta-'oz prevailed יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> yad- And the hand מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; against Israel מִפְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei [and] because מִדְיָ֜ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of the Midianites עָשֽׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su made לָהֶ֣ם׀ la-Hem בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּנְהָרוֹת֙ <S%H4492><s%> ham-min-ha-rOt them the dens אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בֶּֽהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rim, which [are] in the mountains וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמְּעָר֖וֹת <S%H4631><s%> ham-me-'a-Rot and caves וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמְּצָדֽוֹת׃ <S%H4679><s%> ham-me-tza-Dot. and strong holds

וְהָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah it was אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- when זָרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> za-Ra' had sown יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; And [so] it was when Israel וְעָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah came up מִדְיָ֧ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan that the Midianites וַֽעֲמָלֵ֛ק <S%H6002><s%> va-'a-ma-Lek and the Amalekites וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei- and the children קֶ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem of the east וְעָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lu even they came up עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. against

וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <S%H2583><s%> vai-ya-cha-Nu And they encamped עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, against וַיַּשְׁחִ֙יתוּ֙ <S%H7843><s%> vai-yash-Chi-tu against them and destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְב֣וּל <S%H2981><s%> ye-Vul the increase הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the earth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- thou בּוֹאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> bo-'a-Cha till thou come עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> 'az-Zah; unto Gaza וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> yash-'I-ru and left מִֽחְיָה֙ <S%H4241><s%> mich-Yah no sustenance בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, for Israel וְשֶׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> ve-Seh neither sheep וָשׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> va-Shor nor ox וַחֲמֽוֹר׃ <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-Mor. nor ass

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הֵם֩ <S%H1992><s%> hem with וּמִקְנֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H4735><s%> u-mik-nei-Hem with their cattle יַעֲל֜וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu For they came up וְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> ve-'o-ho-lei-Hem, and their tents; יָבֹאוּ ya-vo-'u כוּבָ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-'u came קכְדֵֽי־ <S%H1767><s%> che-dei- as אַרְבֶּה֙ <S%H697><s%> 'ar-Beh grasshoppers לָרֹ֔ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro, for multitude וְלָהֶ֥ם ve-la-Hem וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1581><s%> ve-lig-mal-lei-Hem [for] both they and their camels אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein were without מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par; were without number וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they entered בָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz into the land לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-cha-Tah. to destroy

וַיִּדַּ֧ל <S%H1809><s%> vai-yid-Dal impoverished יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And Israel מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od was greatly מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan; of the Midianites וַיִּזְעֲק֥וּ <S%H2199><s%> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD פ Peh

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- when זָעֲק֥וּ <S%H2199><s%> za-'a-Ku cried בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אֹד֥וֹת <S%H182><s%> o-Dot because מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan. of the Midianites

וַיִּשְׁלַ֧ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh That the LORD אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> na-Vi prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer which said לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I הֶעֱלֵ֤יתִי <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-Lei-ti I brought you up אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, from Egypt וָאֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> va-'o-Tzi and brought you forth אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit out of the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

וָאַצִּ֤ל <S%H5337><s%> va-'atz-Tzil And I delivered אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad you out of the hand מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egyptian וּמִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> u-mi-Yad and out of the hand כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all לֹחֲצֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H3905><s%> lo-cha-tzei-Chem; of all that oppressed וָאֲגָרֵ֤שׁ <S%H1644><s%> va-'a-ga-Resh you and drave them out אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei-Chem, from before וָאֶתְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-te-Nah you and gave לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam. you their land

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah And I said לָכֶ֗ם la-Chem, אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto you I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תִֽירְאוּ֙ <S%H3372><s%> ti-re-'U fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei not the gods הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim ye dwell בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-Tzam; in whose land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> she-ma'-Tem but ye have not obeyed בְּקוֹלִֽי׃ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Li. my voice פ Peh

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo And there came מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach an angel יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat תַּ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הָֽאֵלָה֙ <S%H424><s%> ha-'e-Lah under an oak אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּעָפְרָ֔ה <S%H6084><s%> be-'a-fe-Rah, which [was] in Ophrah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לְיוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> le-yo-'Ash that [pertained] unto Joash אֲבִ֣י 'a-Vi הָֽעֶזְרִ֑י <S%H33><s%> ha-'ez-Ri; the Abiezrite וְגִדְע֣וֹן <S%H1439><s%> ve-gid-'on Gideon בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, and his son חֹבֵ֤ט <S%H2251><s%> cho-Vet threshed חִטִּים֙ <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tim wheat בַּגַּ֔ת <S%H1660><s%> bag-Gat, by the winepress לְהָנִ֖יס <S%H5127><s%> le-ha-Nis to hide מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei [it] from מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan. the Midianites

וַיֵּרָ֥א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about מַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto him and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto him The LORD עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha with גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor [is] with thee thou mighty הֶחָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> he-Cha-yil. man of valour

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֤יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav then גִּדְעוֹן֙ <S%H1439><s%> gid-'On And Gideon בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi unto him Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni, my Lord וְיֵ֤שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ve-Yesh if יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu, us וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah why מְצָאַ֖תְנוּ <S%H4672><s%> me-tza-'At-nu be with us why then is all this befallen כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- has all זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; to us וְאַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> ve-'ai-Yeh and where כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol are all נִפְלְאֹתָ֡יו <S%H6381><s%> nif-le-'o-Tav us;and where [be] all his miracles אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> sip-pe-ru- told לָ֨נוּ La-nu אֲבוֹתֵ֜ינוּ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu which our fathers לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, us of saying הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim Egypt הֶעֱלָ֣נוּ <S%H5927><s%> he-'e-La-nu bring us up יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, Did not the LORD וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah henceforth נְטָשָׁ֣נוּ <S%H5203><s%> ne-ta-Sha-nu hath forsaken יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖נוּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Ne-nu us and delivered בְּכַף־ <S%H3709><s%> be-chaf- us into the hands מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan. of the Midianites

וַיִּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> vai-Yi-fen looked אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, And the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, upon him and said לֵ֚ךְ <S%H1980><s%> lech Go בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> be-cho-cha-Cha in this thy might זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, this וְהוֹשַׁעְתָּ֥ <S%H3467><s%> ve-ho-sha'-Ta and thou shalt save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> mik-Kaf from the hand מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan; of the Midianites הֲלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not שְׁלַחְתִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H7971><s%> she-lach-Ti-cha. have not I sent

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to him בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> bi unto him Oh אֲדֹנָ֔י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, my Lord בַּמָּ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> bam-Mah wherewith אוֹשִׁ֖יעַ <S%H3467><s%> o-Shi-a' shall I save אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold אַלְפִּי֙ <S%H504><s%> 'al-Pi oxen הַדַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> had-Dal [is] poor בִּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> bim-nash-Sheh, in Manasseh וְאָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi and I הַצָּעִ֖יר <S%H6810><s%> hatz-tza-'Ir and I [am] the least בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit house אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi. in my father's
